extendedInfo.description: *********PLEASE READ ALL OF THIS!!!!!***********If you don't read this you can miss some good stuff!!!Complaining about issues here will not help anyone!!! EMAIL ME, I ALWAYS REPLY!!!!NOTICE...THIS IS FOR ROOTED PHONES ONLY.....xHDPI & HDPI ONLY "I CANNOT TEACH YOU HOW TO ROOT YOUR PHONE!!!"There is also a free lite version available with only settings, framework and systemUI themed...NO apps or icons!!! RedJelly was just released, just search for it in the market..... Also if you want your updates 2 days sooner get my DarkJelly & RedJelly donate to support me as well!! Thank You!!!Here is my DarkICE/RedICE page on my site with more goodies Like INVERTED Apollo Music app and Text app along with other apps that cannot be inverted with the theme : http://jbthemes.com/djdarkknight/darkice/********REBOOT AFTER APPLYING TO MAKE SURE EVERYTHING GETS APPLIED...even after updates**************************DO NOT MOVE TO SDCARD....WILL CAUSE ERRORS**********************************If you get an error the theme in not compiled correctly just apply the stock theme and reboot...apply DarkICE and reboot...all will be good!!!*********If you have no idea what that means then PLEASE DON'T DOWNLOAD!!!!!!As you know if you try this I am not resposible for you NOT backing up or your phone gets so sexy someone steals it!!!! Not my fault!!!!! :-)Please Email me with questions...I CANNOT REPLY TO REQUESTS and ISSUES HERE...EMAIL ME PLEASE!!!!Instructions:1. Backup in recovery2. HEY...did you back up?3. Make sure you are on ANY CM9/AOKP release or any rom that includes the theme chooser and the latest gapps!4. You backed up right? Ok just checking!5. Download and install this app from the market6. Go to menu/settings/themes/ select DarkICE and apply....KNOWN ISSUE...YOU WILL GET AN ERROR ABOUT ASSETS AND SCREEN SIZE BLAH BLAH...THAT IS NORMAL...SELECT APPLY ANYWAY.....ONCE DONE REBOOT!!!!7. Enjoy the Darkness!!!Want some DarkICE Wallpapers?Go here and get the theme chooser wallpaper app:"Theme Chooser Wallpapers" - http://bit.ly/LiFhfE Note: DarkICE theme must be applied to see the wallpapers in the app.Included apps:BrowserCalculatorCameraContactsDeskClockDevelopmentExchange email**KeyboardPhoneDownload ProvidersQuick Search BoxSettingsSystemUIVending**DSP ManagerTrebuchetFacebook**Google Plus**Gmail Notify only**Google Quick SearhBoxRomManagerGtalk Notify **Astro File managerTerminalFile managerRom ManagerApex LauncherNOVA LauncherADW LauncherADW EX LauncherXDA prem Rootzwiki PremTheme Chooser wallpaper appPlume "Select Dark Theme" **Handcent ** (choose Hero Skin)Rom ControlLockScreen WidgetDropBox "WIP"Voice SearchOverClock Widget and Icon "select DARK background"Super UserPinger Text freeQuickBootWordPressVideoEditor IconMMS Icon Gmail Icon Gtalk Icon Calendar Icon weather Icon Apollo Icon Youtube Voice DialerInstagram iconRootzwiki prem icon SU IconFacebook messenger iconNetFlix IconSWYPEGoogle PlayGoo manager IconReader IconRom toolbox IconPlay MusicFlashPlayer Icon** Have Animated NotifyLAST BUT VERY IMPORTANT>>>>>>>>>>>>.........ENJOY :-)DJ Darkknight@djdarkknight96 on twitterfollow on twitter to see up and coming additions

reviews.title: Not too shabby
reviews.comment: Not bad at all, one thing I\'ve noticed is some text is white on white, leaving it unreadable. Namely the Facebook app and some market place text. I\'ve probably noticed more, I\'ll adjust this when I do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally found...
reviews.comment: This awesome! Been wanting something like this for BIONIC ICS Boom I got. Thank you so much for sure getting the donate version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just wish it wasn\'t so big! I like to keep my phone slim
reviews.author: Mik\303\246l Myrkyllisyys

reviews.title: Best CM9/AOKP theme out there!
reviews.comment: This is the darkest, most complete theme I have found. Its amazing. DarkGinger on CM7 was the greatest for GB and this is the greatest for ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MoPho running TH3bill AOKP with JOKERSAX CM9 base
reviews.comment: Awesome. One of the best themes period. @ matt. It\'s really simple and it works awesome just follow directions in the description wow how did you even root your phone let alone have a rom? ACS( android creative syndicate) contributor. .CURTICE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Micromax A87
reviews.comment: Can this theme work in cm7 plz reply me fast i love this theme.....
reviews.author: Vishal Saklani

reviews.title: Not working properly
reviews.comment: After applying the theme, i got an error message saying the theme is not optimised for my screen size.. but I choose apply any way.. after the theme loaded, the nav bar and notification bar was missing.. pls fix this...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this theme, but..
reviews.comment: I so wish there was a version without flashing notification icons! They are very annoying.  Which is a shame because this is easily the best dark /black theme going. And it\'s free!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautifully black
reviews.comment: I love it, just one issue. My soft keys continue to glow after I press them. I\'ve turned down my color settings (gamma, etc.) to no avail. I changed my soft key glow to black, which eliminates the after glow. Sorry to lose the effect but worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fb app problem!!
reviews.comment: Fb app is themed too but due to theme the notification text are not visible..  White text with white background,  thats y..  Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: There
reviews.comment: I usually don\'t comment on these apps but i have to tell you this is better than those paid themes like lucid and all that other crap. I tried all of those aokp themes and they sucked lol i love this theme!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Does what it says,  great white on black complete theme.  Reason for 4 stars is occasionally text can be hard to read for some selection boxes or text fields. Great job, thanks dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: Thank you so much I\'m buying apps from this developer all the time now    perfection
reviews.author: rafael gavina

reviews.title: Best theme ever
reviews.comment: THE Best theme to date. I love ever change and I love the on screen button change.
reviews.author: Brady Kraabel

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: So extremely nice best theme ever. Wish you can theme the blue color when you slide the homescreen to the last page
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Matt
reviews.comment: Cant seem to get it to work on my phone.  I have the galaxy 2a 4g  LTE. I can\'t swim to find theme in my phone settings either.  Can anyone help me please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent....
reviews.comment: This theme is great on the eyes , and installs easily. Thanks!
reviews.author: Jeff Tollefson

reviews.title: Ss
reviews.comment: Fix the Facebook notification problem!!! You can\'t read them without selecting them!!!

reviews.title: Crappy icons
reviews.comment: Hard to read in general.
